Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration

Class BlockBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.AbstractBlock
        • net.minecraft.block.Block
          • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration.BlockBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registerable, net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockTE
    public class BlockBase
extends net.minecraft.block.Block
implements Registerable
    Base class for blocks for mods using ModXRegistration. This will automatically set the creative tab if it's defined in the mod and register a block item.
